xwikidoc.name: XCSTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepAppBar.title=Applications Bar xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepAppBar.content1=The Applications Bar is the place to launch existing applications found on this wiki. xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepAppBar.content2=As Administrator, you can manage it, adding more or creating new applications.
xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepDashboard.title=Dashboard xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepDashboard.content1=The Dashboard is collecting recent applications and page events from the wiki. xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepDashboard.content2=As Administrator, you can customize it and select what to display.
xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepJoinWiki.title=Join Wiki xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepJoinWiki.content1=In order to have rights to create new pages and applications entries on this wiki, you need to be a member.
xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.title=Breadcrumb xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.content1=The breadcrumb allows you to identify where you are and navigate the hierarchy. xcs.workspace.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.content2=The Home icon will take you to the main Home, where you can access all your wikis.
